nl.esciencecenter.esight.util

Class Settings

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.esciencecenter.esight.util.Settings

  • public class Settings
extends java.lang.Object
    A singleton pattern generic Settings File reader for use in OpenGL applications. Pair this with a settings.properties file in your project root.
    Author:
    Maarten van Meersbergen
    See Also:
